h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Stone Vanguard
h3_title: Secret - Get Help from the Shigandang
content: When the fight starts you’ll need to watch out for an incoming leaping strike with one of its front arms, which it will usually follow up by rearing up and then slamming down with both arms pulled out around its front.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fright_Cliff_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Fright Cliff Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Stone Vanguard' and the sub-subsection 'Secret - Get Help from the Shigandang'.
The content is as follows:
When the fight starts you’ll need to watch out for an incoming leaping strike with one of its front arms, which it will usually follow up by rearing up and then slamming down with both arms pulled out around its front.
